name: +\L.L./+
info: A Sinner adept at supporting allies. Brings one [Precious] when entering battle.
ecbFlavourText:
"I will drown in that wave unnoticed by anyone."
"...Then, take me away."

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: TBA
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When the battle begins, [Precious] will store 20% / 30% / 40% of the excess energy of allied Sinners on-field, storing up to 3 energy per second, up to 6 / 7 / 8 energy. When [Data Diversion] is used, L.L. uses up all stored energy and restores additional X energy to the target.

maniaIntensify.title: TBA
maniaIntensify.text: When allied Sinners have [Precious], they receive X% of L.L.’s Attack as an Attack increase, the effect lasting until [Precious] leaves.

media.title: [Eng CC] Path to Nowhere: "Indulge, Care-free Ocean" PV Full BGM (with Lyrics)

shackles.title: Addiction
shackles.description: When the battle begins, Chief gains one energy. Every time Chief uses Potestas, allied Sinners on-field gain a 3% Attack increase, lasting for the whole battle, stacking up to 5 times.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: L.L. gains 18 energy at the start of battle.

skills.name: Wireless Connection
skills.description: L.L. gathers energy to attack, dealing (Attack * 63%) True Damage each time.

skills.name: Data Diversion
skills.description: L.L. restores 9 energy to an allied Sinner immediately, as well as attaching [Precious] to them, lasting for the whole battle.

upgrade.description: Energy restoration increases to $0. [Data Diversion] energy cost reduced to $0.

skills.name: Sole Dissimilitude
skills.description:
The Sinner carrying [Precious] receives 15% Skill Damage increase.
When [Precious] leaves, this effect will continue for X seconds.

skills.name: Breakpoint Continuance
skills.description: Each time Chief uses Potestas, L.L. gains 10% Energy Recovery Speed increase, lasting for 8 seconds.

upgrade.description: Energy Recovery Speed bonus increases to $0%.

maniaIntensifyText: When allied Sinners have [Precious], they receive X% of L.L.’s Attack as an Attack increase, the effect lasting until [Precious] leaves.
criminalRecord: The "Host" of the well-known dark web forum, "Elysiland". The subject turned the aforementioned website forum into a virtual world where nothing was off limits, using internet rays and electrons to stimulate and trap people's mental consciousnesses.
mutationAssessment: The subject's ability is [Data Worm]. The subject's awakened ability is analogous to a computer worm, corrupting data via the subject's virtual pet that always follows them around. According to the subject's will, electronic code data is duplicated and transmitted to different targets, interfering with their central nervous systems. After investigation, there is distinction between good and bad quality data signals.
